title: Wout van Aert Is Rocking the Belgian TV Show the Masked Singer … or Is He?
content:
Mounting speculation that Belgian star has been entertaining TV audiences while dressed up as a giant furry squirrel. Is it nuts?

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Is Rocking the Belgian TV Show the Masked Singer … or Is He? on Velo.
